meaningMnemonic:
Remember how 研究 means “research?” Well the <kanji>room</kanji> where you do research is a <vocabulary>laboratory</vocabulary>!

研究室 refers to a <vocabulary>lab room</vocabulary>, often within a larger institution like a university or college.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
